code: import React from"react";import"../styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function MovieCard(_ref){let{movie,iswatchlisted,toggleWatchlist}=_ref;const getratingcolour=rating=>{if(rating>8){return"rating-good";}else if(rating>5){return"rating-ok";}return"rating-bad";};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"images/".concat(movie.image)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-card-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"movie-card-title",children:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"movie-card-genre",children:movie.genre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"movie-card-rating ".concat(getratingcolour(movie.rating)),children:movie.rating})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"switch",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:iswatchlisted,onChange:()=>toggleWatchlist(movie.id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"slider",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"slider-label",children:iswatchlisted?"In Watchlist":"Add to Watchlist"})})]})]})]},movie.id);}
